# cmccloudv2_elb_pool_member (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `address` (String) The IP address of the resource
- `name` (String)
- `pool_id` (String)
- `protocol_port` (Number) The protocol port number for the resource.
- `weight` (Number) The weight of a member determines the portion of requests or connections it services compared to the other members of the pool. For example, a member with a weight of 10 receives five times as many requests as a member with a weight of 2. A value of 0 means the member does not receive new connections but continues to service existing connections. A valid value is from 0 to 256. Default is 1

### Optional

- `backup` (Boolean) Is the member a backup? Backup members only receive traffic when all non-backup members are down.
- `monitor_address` (String) An alternate IP address used for health monitoring a backend member
- `monitor_port` (Number) An alternate protocol port used for health monitoring a backend member
- `subnet_id` (String) The subnet ID the member service is accessible from.
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `operating_status` (String)
- `provisioning_status` (String)
